txt.en: Goblins and dwarves have despised each other since they first set eyes upon one another. They are natural enemies both above ground and below, with the goblins' countless numbers crashing year after year against the tireless defences of the dwarves, wearing away at them like tides against rock.

Your efforts to defeat the goblins have been tireless. While it seems that two rise up for every one you fell, your battles buy time for your kinsmen to further strengthen the defences of their halls and fortresses.
